name: Showdown Adventure
description: Take part in awesome, funny adventure on unfriendly, dangerous island! Defeat monsters, discover big world and collect unique items.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz+ or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 2xx Series or Radeon HD 6xxx series or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Minimum display size: 1280x720, WebGL2 Support
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 2.4GHz+ or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 4xx Series or Radeon HD 7xxx series or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Minimum display size: 1280x720, WebGL2 Support
